item.name: Current Daily Partition count
item.description: Gets the current count of the number of daily partitions in the /var/lib/mysql/zabbixdb, this will need to be adjusted to fit your environment.

item.name: Tomorrow Daily Partition Count
item.description:
ls /var/lib/mysql/zabbixdb | grep -c $(date -d "$(date +%F)"+Xdays "+%Y%m%d")
Workflow 1. List the content of the /var/lib/mysql/zabbixdb folder 2. Print the grep count of current date, + X days ahead, printing the format like the partition file name.
